title: Economic Impact of COVID-19 in Sub-Saharan Africa
name: economic-impact-of-covid-19-in-sub-saharan-africa
notes: This data looks at the impact of COVID-19 on employment, income, ability to pay expenses, and more in Côte D'Ivoire, Kenya, Mozambique Nigeria, and South Africa. Data is nationally representative by age, gender, and location, and is broken down by job type and formal or informal workers. Please contact us for data broken down by province or more information on the methodology.
caveats: This survey was conducted by SMS through GeoPoll's SMS survey platform, and so the sample frame consists of those who own mobile phones.

resources.description: Excel file containing row-level data and the questionnaire for GeoPoll's economic impact of coronavirus study.
resources.name: Economic Impact of COVID19 Sub Saharan Africa.xlsx
